contents: 3. leaves 16b-18b: Bard al-ẓalāl fī takrīr al-suʼāl.
4. leaves 19a-21a: Ajwibah ʻan asʼilah fī aḥwal al-mawtá.
5. leaves 22a-27a: Tuḥfat al-sullāk fī faḍl al-siwāk.
7. leaves 36b-46a: Kashf al-khidr ʻan amr al-Khiḍr.
11. leaves 59b-60a: Baḥth tasrīḥ al-liḥyah / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Harawī.
12. leaf 60b: Baḥth khalq Allāh Ādam ʻalá ṣūratih. Extract from a gloss on a work by al-Bayḍāwī.
13. leaf 61a: Baḥth al-ʻimāmah wa-al-ʻadhabah / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Harawī.
14. leaves 62b-73b: Rafʻ al-ishkāl bi-ẓuhūr al-ʻashr fī al-ʻashr fī ghālib al-ashkāl.
subject: Beards—Religious aspects—Islam—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
